template.name: Content Provider
template.description: Creates a new content provider component and adds it to your Android manifest.

parameter.name: URI Authorities
parameter.help: A list of one or more URI authorities that identify data under the purview of the content provider.

parameter.name: Exported
parameter.help: Whether or not the content provider can be used by components of other applications

parameter.name: Enabled
parameter.help: Whether or not the content provider can be instantiated by the system
